@ansiaedisprezzo Hi @ansiaedisprezzo,
I am sorry to hear your bag is delayed. If you haven't reported your bag at the airport, please do so here: https://t.co/uHX1YFCLU3 You can track your bag here: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU
or call baggage service here: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Kind regards, Lena

Kind regards, Lena

data.text:
@Rubyslippers111 @Rubyslippers111 Hi, the handling time is longer than usual right now. As long as you have a CaseID your case is in queue and will be handled as fast as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@TroelsOerum @TroelsOerum Hej, tyvärr är det längre hanteringstid än normalt just nu, vilket vi beklagar. Vår customer care avdelning kommer att återkomma till dig så fort som möjligt.
Vänlig hälsning, Mikael.

@chamirafernando @chamirafernando You can try to call them first to check if there is any other solution, but I can't guarantee it https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2 We apologize for any inconvenience.
Kind regards, Mikael

data.text:
@marcelemoran Hi! 

Thank you for flying with SAS. I recommend that you contact us on our live-chat or call us so we can check on the options that you have for your ticket. You can find our contact details here https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj. We are happy to assist you further.

Kind regards,
Farah

Thank you for flying with SAS, we hope you enjoy your flight. We are happy to assist you with ordering kids meal , Please contact us on our live-chat or call us so we can help you further . You can find our contact details here https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 

Best Regards,
Farah

@DennesDon @DennesDon Hi, I am sorry to hear your bags are delayed. But I can't track them in my system, that is handled by the baggage service at the airport, so for more information please contact them: https://t.co/ZV9bTNLSZs
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Baggage

data.text:
@jesperbouw15 @jesperbouw15 Hi, there is a certain amount of youth tickets and they are not available on all flights. They are very popular, so they can be sold out. I recommend using the calendar when searching for available tickets, instead of specific dates.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@whereangiewand1 Hi! If you contact our live chat or call us on our phones, we can see the status of your compensation claim. You find our live chat and contact information here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Ask Turi for customer service and he will transfer you to a live agent. kind regards. Sandy

data.text:
@damiandugdale Hi @damiandugdale, the handling time is longer than usual right now. Our customer care department will reply to you as fast as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@sarahjdocker Hi Sarah!
Certain items, such as flammable items are considered dangerous goods and may not be carried on the aircraft.
Kind regards,
Lena

urls.title: Delayed or damaged baggage
urls.description: If your baggage was damaged or delayed, just fill in a form so we can determine your compensation.

data.text:
@Keelychiericato Hi! If there is a fee or not depends on your ticket and the price of the new ticket. To get a more precise price, please contact our customer support. You can find your local phone number and our live chat here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@Sandy_Grigelis Hi Sandy. Using your PIR-number, you should be able to use this link https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU to chose where your luggage is to be sent. You can also call SAS Baggage Service in Copenhagen with this number +45 32 32 32 60 to decide a new point of delivery. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@IDreamInSQL Hi! 

Yes as long as you are flying in SAS Plus then you will have access to our fast track. 

Kind regards,
Dennis

@rscrase Hi! 

Okay it might be that your seats/extra bags was refunded first as that is sometimes handled separately. We can help you have a closer look at it if you contact our live-chat instead.

Kind regards,
Dennis

@Maymayloveli Hi! 

Okay! I would recommend that you contact our customer service by live-chat or by phone so we can help you correct the name. If you booked the trip via a travel agency then you need to contact them in order to fix it.
https://t.co/O6Jy9vqnvM

Kind regards, 
Dennis

@buckhugh2 Hi! 

You should be able to register it on our website at my bookings, but if you don't get that alternative then i recommend that you call our customer service by phone so we can help you.
https://t.co/O6Jy9vqnvM

Kind regards,
Dennis

data.text:
@angiepeltzer Hi! 

I'm sorry that you've had to wait for a reply on your case, we sadly have a long queue right now so the best i can recommend is to wait until an agent contacts you. They are working on it as fast as possible.

Kind regards,
Dennis

@TomBreckwoldt1 Hi! 

I'm sorry that your bag went missing.  We will update you as soon as we find your bag and send it to your closest airport. You can check your bags status here: https://t.co/HEz1TwbZCI

Kind regards,
Dennis

@MeowlotNL Hi! If you do not like speaking over the phone we also have a live chat. You can find the chat here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@dansouleles Hi! The claim needs to be sent via the online form. Please call us or contact our live chat so that we can send in an error report about this to our IT department. You can find our live chat and phone number here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 
Kind Regards, Natasha

Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: 25th Anniversary
urls.description: We are better when we are connected. For 25 years, Star Alliance has been bringing people together across the globe to develop new ideas, seize opportunities and make their mark on the world. Venus Ex Machina is a Zimbabwean-Scottish award-winning composer and interdisciplinary artist with a background in mathematics and audio engineering. She has lectured and performed internationally and is currently working on a score for the National Theatre of Scotland and Rona Munro play "Queen of the Fight". She

data.text:
@Fondacey Hi!

You can bring your Longboard as a carryon as long as it is within the approved dimensions.
Maximum size: 55 cm x 40 cm x 23 cm (length x width x depth).
Maximum weight: 8 kg
This info can be found here: https://t.co/2UUXPRN2w1

I wish you the best day!
Kind regards, Angelica

urls.title: Carry On Baggage – Size and Weight Limits
urls.description: You can always bring one carry-on bag (8 kg) and one personal item in the cabin free of charge. Your allowance depends on your travel class »

data.text:
@Claire_bouet Hi!
If you do not have any denied boarding certificate for this plane, you are able to send in this through another form for requesting compensation.
You find this form here: https://t.co/xMt9zSrqJc

I wish you the best day!
Kind regards, Angelica

data.text:
@ValkRebecca Hi!
Our recommendation is for you to be at the Airport for Baggage Drop around 2-3 hours before your specific departure!
We are looking forward for you to fly with us! ✈️😃

I wish you the best day!
Kind regards, Angelica

@cybermazz Hi!
We have listed all of the different numbers for each Airport regarding Baggage Service through this link: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM
The number for Miami Airport is also stated among these.
MIAMI: PHONE: +1 954 448 0837

I wish you the best day!
Kind regards, Angelica

Kind regards, Angelica

urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@MarjolijnKetti1 Hi! 

I'm sorry that your flight was cancelled, the best i can recommend in your case is to contact us via our live-chat or phone to customer service. We sadly don't have an email that can help you with this. 

Kind regards, 
Dennis

@GuySegway Hi! 

I apologize if your trip was changed, the best i can recommend in that case is to send in a claim to Customer  Care so they can help you look at it. You can send in your claim here: https://t.co/oKlCwpaMq8

Kind regards,
Dennis

urls.title: Canceled or Delayed Flight
urls.description: If your flight was delayed or canceled because of us, you may be entitled to compensation. If you’re entitled to compensation, we will compensate you in accordance with the EU261 regulation.

data.text:
@PhilShort4 Hi! 

If the original flight has a new departure time, the flight number remains the same. Refund is permitted if the new departure time is changed by more than 1 hour before departure or 1 hour later than the original scheduled time of departure.

Kind regards,
Dennis

@shannypoooo Hi @shannypoooo, please contact us via our live chat and we will help you check your available options and rebook your ticket. We apologize for any inconvenience https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Mikael
